text: I suppose pus is potentially disgusting
but the great thing is that it does mean
that you are winning the battle against
infection and bacteria and all of that
sort of thing
and with the best one in the world much
as we might like to try and deny it pass
is quite sort of satisfying when it
comes out my best person experience was
as a small boy eight or nine years old I
had a boil on my meg it must have been a
boil formed by an infection of the very
first hair follicle I developed and it
grew quite big and it was very sore and
I didn't like it and then one day I
touched it and it went and had a sort of
cone of fairly rubbery pus came out of
my leg and left a sort of bore hole
behind and it was so incredibly
incredibly cathartic it just
It was as if early all the terrors of
childhood all the concerns of my infancy
had become this this plug and I expunged
it and after that I was made whole and
became a man I presumed that little
plaque is still lying around somewhere
wherever we lived at the time near
Bristol on the floor I'm pretty sure he
hasn't dissolved or anything like that
he was it was like a piece of ivory
